member.name: M:CodeGenerator.Controllers.GenerateController.Get(CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters)
member.summary: Generate and return requested code as PNG image.
member.response: If parameters validation failed or something went wrong during generation.

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.Content
member.summary: Text from which code will be generated

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.Height
member.summary: Height of code (Default: 300px for square, 100px for rect)

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.Margin
member.summary: Margin from left and right side of code (Default: 2px)

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.SkipStringContent
member.summary: Set to true for do not generate string below barcodes

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Foreground color in hex format (Acceptable: ffffff or %23ffffff)

member.name: P:CodeGenerator.ResourceParameters.GenerateResourceParameters.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color in hex format (Acceptable: ffffff or %23ffffff)
